entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
